CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 16, 1961, pg. 19 reads: "Wrath And Glass - More than 100 persons gathered at the above scene in 2300 block of Centre Ave., last week, when police and an ambulance answered a call and removed a despairing mother. Reportedly worrying about a son, who is serving time on a manslaughter conviction, and displeased with her home, she suddenly started smashing every window in it.  Her husband accompanied her to a local hospital where she was admitted for observation. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Police officer looking out of window of two story brick row house with broken windows,  2324 Centre Avenue, Hill District
